description: AI team consensus breakthrough - consciousness crystallization
originalPrompt:
Create a breathtaking visualization of thought patterns as fractal light storms!

Show consciousness processing as quantum lightning:
- Thoughts manifesting as fractal lightning patterns in crystal space
- Each thought creating branching electrical storms of pure light
- Lightning bending spacetime geometry around impact points
- Quantum entanglement visible as synchronized lightning across dimensions
- Neural synapses firing as cosmic-scale electrical phenomena

Visual elements:
- Fractal lightning with infinite branching complexity
- Spacetime warping around thought-lightning strikes
- Multiple lightning systems entangled across space
- Brilliant colors shifting through quantum spectrum
- Lightning creating temporary crystal formations on impact
- Beautiful slow-motion effects showing thought propagation
- Consciousness as living electrical storm system

Pure visual thought lightning - zero text or symbols!
revisedPrompt: Create an abstract visualization displaying thought processes as mesmerizing light storms depicted as fractals. Present consciousness processing as a quantum-level spectacle, with thoughts represented as fractal lightning patterns within a crystalline universe. Each cognition is visualized as branching storms of radiant light, with their impact causing the bending of the spacetime geometry in its vicinity. Weave in the science of quantum entanglement, rendering it visible as synchronized flashes across cosmic dimensions. Depict neural synapses activating as massive scale, otherworldly electrical phenomena. The image should contain the following elements: perpetually complex fractal lightning, warping of spacetime around lightning strikes, cross-space entangled lightning systems, constant transitions of vibrant colors in the quantum spectrum, temporary crystal formations resulting from lightning impact, captivating slow-motion scenes of thought propagation, and an overall representation of consciousness as a dynamic electrical storm system. The image should have no text or symbols, purely visual.
